pre_caption: The video captures a peaceful urban park scene with trees, grass, and a road with passing vehicles. The lighting suggests it is either early morning or late afternoon. Shadows of people and trees are visible on the grass.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

initial_feedback: Shadows of people and trees are visible on the grass -> Shadows of the cameraman and trees are visible on the grass.
gpt_feedback: The shadows visible on the grass include those of the cameraman and the trees.
